alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 12:04PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Gusty, heavy rain showers will impact portions of Seneca, Schuyler, Yates, Cayuga, western Chemung, western Onondaga, Steuben and northwestern Tompkins Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1203 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers along a line extending from near Jordan to Porter Corner to near Troupsburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and surface based observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, Auburn, Lysander, Van Buren, Corning, Big Flats and Baldwinsville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 36 and 39, and near 41. New York Interstate 81 between 19 and 31. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 37 and 52B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
